product_name: SportRack Hitch Mounted Folding Cargo Carrier
long_description: If you need extra cargo space and don't want to hassle with loading a roof box, the Hitch Mounted Folding Cargo Carrier from SportRack makes transporting your gear easy and convenient. Basket measures, 60 in. x 20 in. and features 6 in. tall side walls to keep cargo secure; basket folds up when not in use. Heavy-duty tubular steel construction; compatible with a 2 in. hitch; maximum load is 500 lbs. including weight of carrier and cargo. Built-in reflectors on front of basket increase visibility.
short_description: If you need extra cargo space and don't want to hassle with loading a roof box, the Hitch Mounted Folding Cargo Carrier from SportRack makes transporting your gear easy and convenient.
